Posts.Content: May 29, 2013 07:50AM GraceBorow wrote: Lana, I too was just diagnosed. Exactly what happened to you happened to me.  June 10th I am scheduled to have a mastectomy. Pathology report says tumor size is 3.6 x3.1x2.0 cm. Grade 3.  Invasive Ductal Carcinoma.  Margins Postitive.  Scared, unhappy, crying, praying. I know what you are going through. Grace
Posts.Title: Scared LanaM Sparkytheimp
